channel.title: Need a 377 client, NO SPRITES
channel.description: Im looking for a 377 open source client that does not have custom sprites.

item.title: Need a 377 client, NO SPRITES
item.dc:creator: @AD_LVL_7 AD LVL 7
item.description:
@AD_LVL_7 wrote:

there once was a tutorial on how to make a 317 client 377.
I don’t know if that tut still exists, but i’ll search

EDIT: find a 317 edible client
then First in client.java search:

if(aBoolean960 && signlink.cache_dat != null) { int j = aClass42_Sub1_1068.method555(79, 0); for(int i1 = 0; i1 < j; i1++) { int l1 = aClass42_Sub1_1068.method559(i1, -203); if((l1 & 0x79) == 0) Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.method461(116, i1); }
}

Replace that with:

[code] if(aBoolean960 && signlink.cache_dat != null)
{
int j = aClass42_Sub1_1068.method555(79, 0);
for(int i1 = 0; i1 < j; i1++)
{
int l1 = aClass42_Sub1_1068.method559(i1, -203);
if((l1 & 0x79) == 0)
{
Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.method461(116, i1);
}
}

    }[/code]

Now search:

[code] if(signlink.cache_dat != null)
{
for(int i = 0; i < 5; i++)
aClass14Array970[i] = new Class14(0x7a120, signlink.cache_dat, signlink.cache_idx[i], i + 1, true);

    }[/code]

replace that with:

[code] if(signlink.cache_dat != null)
{
for(int i = 0; i < 5; i++)
{
aClass14Array970[i] = new Class14(0xffffff, signlink.cache_dat, signlink.cache_idx[i], i + 1, true);
}

    }[/code]

then change the cache with a 377 cache

[b]NOTE: I do not take credit for this.[/b]

Read full topic
